name: Create or update a contact when a new row is added to a Google Sheet
description: Every time a new row is added in Google Sheets, Make will automatically create or update a contact in Mautic. This example uses the sheet [in this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1U5Y_YuhlwkmssgLdtVX7_DQNYvM9l-8ftMdoVPhp2GA/edit#gid=0).
